top_comment.text:
More Details Emerge on the Death of Michael Hastings

"Earlier today, WikiLeaks sent out a cryptic tweet that hinted they had 
more information about yesterday's tragic death of reporter Michael 
Hastings. They followed through with another tweet claiming that Hastings 
reached out to one of their lawyers to reveal to them he believed the FBI 
was investigating him."*

Our friend and colleague Michael Hastings died early Tuesday morning in a 
one-car crash in Los Angeles. Wikileaks' Twitter account is now reporting 
that hours before his death, Hastings contacted Wikileaks lawyer Jennifer 
Robinson saying he was being investigated by the FBI. Some establishment 
media outlets have taken care to try and assault Hasting's character and 
achievements as a journalist. 

CLICK HERE http://youtu.be/uoyuXzM059Q to Watch Cenk Uygur break it down.﻿
top_comment.author: The Young Turks

comments.text: AWESOME JOB!!!!
comments.author: Stephen Desrosier

top_comment.text:
#michaelhastingsdeath  "More details are revealed on the death of Michael 
Hastings (via Wikileaks) ...
Published on Jun 19, 2013
"Earlier today, WikiLeaks sent out a cryptic tweet that hinted
they had more information about yesterday's tragic death of reporter 
Michael Hastings. They followed through with
another tweet claiming that Hastings reached out to one
of their lawyers to reveal to them he believed the FBI was
 investigating him."*
Our friend and colleague Michael Hastings died early Tuesday morning in a 
one-car crash in Los Angeles. Wikileaks' Twitter account is now reporting 
that hours before his death, Hastings contacted Wikileaks lawyer Jennifer 
Robinson saying he was being investigated by the FBI. Some establishment 
media
outlets have taken care to try and assault Hasting's
character and achievements as a journalist.
Cenk Uygur breaks it down. "

Anyone wanna reshare w/ better hashtags, go for it!!
Thanks ...﻿

comments.author: Jane Millerick

comments.text:
High +Jane Millerick Having problems with hashtag ?. It's placed with " 
shift "  and " 3 " for a word together and simultaneous . Example; ,,  More 
details are revealed on the death of Michael Hastings  " can be ;   ,,   
#More details are revealed on the #death of #Michael #Hastings . And ;
,, Hastings contacted Wikileaks lawyer Jennifer Robinson saying he was 
being investigated by FBI " can be ;
, , #Hastings contacted #Wikileaks lawyer #Jennifer #Robinson saying he was 
being investigated by #FBI "

While typing the word direct after an #, suggestions popup. Hoover to it 
with your mouse, click enter.

comments.text:
My hole life has been a nightmare,a witch put a curse on me and my children 
back in 1993 at lake of the Isle ,my son Joseph cried and felt her presence 
before I did.Children are more in tune to these evil beings than adults.she 
smiled laughed looked at me and my 2 sons and my 1 daughter pointed and 
disappeared.my life has been crap since along with my 3 children.my wife 
was spared as for the fact she was not there. And I'm homeless so nothing 
you can do to me can hurt.if you are a wizard then spare me and my children 
from this witch that cast her evil spell unto my innocent family.

comments.author: Willi Bleimeister

comments.text:
+Ellim Sluouf
Yeah..just discussed this with a gearhead buddy...you'd have to be going 
120mph minimum for the engine to be hurled out, based on what happens in 
NASCAR, where the cars are much lighter & less Tanklike than the ( believe, 
but an mot yet sure) Mercedes C-class he drove (which only goes 130 mph if 
it can get up
 there, unless it's the 554 hp version)...this stinks...I've seen cars 
catch fire . but have very rarely seen a completely burned car...it's much 
more common for an non moving car to catch fire because of electrical 
malfunctions....well, I've only serviced maybe 25-30,000 cars..what do I 
know?
comments.author: Willi Bleimeister

comments.text:

comments.author: Ellim Sluouf

comments.text:
For an impact to cause a modern car (I believe he had a Mercedes) to burst 
into all consuming flames is very unusual, an artifact of action movies, 
but rarely in real life. Modern cars are designed to shut down systems on 
impact, especially a car like the Mercedes...my only expertise in this is 
the 25 years I spent in Auto Service....
comments.author: Willi Bleimeister
